resp = client.search(
    index="log-messages",
    filter_path="aggregations",
    aggs={
        "categories": {
            "categorize_text": {
                "field": "message",
                "categorization_filters": [
                    "\\w+\\_\\d{3}"
                ]
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
